Uses of Package
ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

  • Classes in ualberta.g12.adventurecreator used by ualberta.g12.adventurecreator 
    Class and Description
    Choice
    Used to implement, set, and link desired choices to each other.
    FController
    Control of data in the Fragment model.
    FModel
    The Model that all Fragment Models must extend.
    Fragment
    Saves and returns all the corresponding fragment information upon fragment saving or fragment recall.
    FragmentController
    Controller that dictates all fragment methods.
    FView
    Interface for all of the Views that Deal with the Fragment Model.
    Provides the method update(M) which is called whenever we the Fragment Model has been updated.
    LModel
    All StoryList models adhere to this class.
    LView
    All interfaces that deal with the StoryList Model must implement me.
    SController
    Controls data from the Story Model
    SModel
    A Model class that all Story Model Classes should extend.
    Story
    Models a story that would be created by an Author.
    StoryController
    Controller for the stories that deal with the information regarding stories in the application.
    StoryList
    Models the list of stories
    StoryListController
    controller that interacts with the listview of stories
    SView
    A view that interacts the story model
